channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- vRealize Operations for Horizon (V4H)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- vRealize Operations for Horizon (V4H)

item.title: CVE-2017-4946|2024-09-16T16:13:08.171Z -- vmware -- vrealize%20operations%20for%20horizon%20%28v4h%29
item.description: The VMware V4H and V4PA desktop agents (6.x before 6.5.1) contain a privilege escalation vulnerability. Successful exploitation of this issue could result in a low privileged windows user escalating their privileges to SYSTEM.
